ygData.subject: Re: Lady Hawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk turns, startled at Zardus sudden arival. She hoped he hadn t heard what her and Squizzy had been discussing. She stepped back and buried the DNA

Lady Hawk turns, startled at Zardus' sudden arival. She hoped he 
hadn't heard what her and Squizzy had been discussing. She stepped 
back and buried the DNA scans from the CR chambers in with the other 
data they'd collected. "Nail everything down? How am I supposed to do 
my work if I can't move it?" she was hoping her snotty pampered 
attitude would keep Zardus' mind away from her tests.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Sorry if this post is quick, I got 3 mins before class.
> 
> ::Zardus/WarMachine/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::
> 
> Aproaching the lab, Zardus stops as he recieves a transmission, 
> supposedly from a ship. He frowns, looking at his wrist comp and 
> scanning through the reports. That wasn't right... The ship that 
had 
> exploded had emitted almost no energy, not enough to even register 
on 
> more than visuals. The pods seemed real though..
> 
> "WarMachine," he says into his comm, "There are a few pods near the 
> base, could you retreave them?"
> 
> With that, Zardus walks into the lab. "Strap down anything 
fragile," 
> he says to Lady Hawk and Squizzy, "We're moving to a new base. Or 
> rather moving this base to it."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> WarMachine nods as he recieves Zardus' transmission. "On my way," 
he 
> says, heading for the pods.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike waits for Life to answer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica enters the bridge of the Alliance base, sitting down at 
the 
> scanners, frowning as he recieves the transmission.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer frowns as he sees the gun in Vamprah's hand. Reaching out 
> carefully, he tries to take the gun from her.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lady Hawk got an idea, maybe having an assistant wasn't such a 
bad 
> idea.
> > 
> > "Say, you wouldn't know how to find CR information for a repaired 
> bot would
> > you? These systems just aren't up to the standards meant for a 
bot 
> of my
> > status." She was hoping that Squizzy could gain the information 
she 
> couldn't
> > find.
> > 
> > "I could make it worth your effort to help me gain the 
information I 
> need."
> > Lady Hawk knew that a bot with the information she'd given would 
> have to
> > fully understand the technology involved. Squizzy did which left 
two
> > options, either take her back to Veratis when she went, or have a 
> late
> > supper
